lines.text: Yes! Today is the first day of the rest of my life. Life has given me lemons, and I'm going to make lemonade. I got a tiger by his tail and he's mean! I got a stiff upper lip and a tight ass.
Uh-huh. Well what can I do for you?
Mother, how am I going to choke on pie?

[Singing to the song "looking Over a Four Leaf Clover"]
I'm looking over, my dead dog Rover, the one I just hit with the mower! One leg is missing, the other is gone, the third one is splattered all over the lawn!
Roses are red, Violets are placid, you screwed me over, have a face full of acid!
